How It Works

HOW IT WORKS

Finding Projects on GradSkills isFast, Easy & Free

01

Apply

Choose which projects you like and apply with a click.

Find projects that fit your interests, skills & schedule and apply directly, or get invited by companies seeking your talents. Apply in minutes using your GradSkills profile – it’s fast, simple & easy.

  • See how you can tailor posts to you needs

    Tips for landing the projects you want
    You've found the perfect project and want to make sure your application stands out... Here are the two most important things you can do to get noticed & land your project:

    • Create a winning Gradskills profile

      Your Gradskills profile offers several ways to showcase your abilities & stand out, whether or not you have lots of professional experience. Use your profile to put your best foot forward, and get noticed by the companies you want to work with most.

    • Add a compelling cover note

      Cover notes are optional, but can help set you apart. Adding a short, effective cover note to an application lets you connect with project owners and gives an opportunity to highlight the motivations, skills & attributes that make you a great fit for the project.

02

Meet

Meet clients via call, video or chat and get hired.

Connect with project owners remotely to discuss details and see if there's a good fit. Get offers directly through GradSkills, and accept with a click if you approve project terms.

  • Tips for a successful project interview

    Tips for a successful project interview
    Project interviews are a great way to introduce yourself and discuss project details, without the travel & added stress of traditional job interviews. Here are some tips:

    • Master the environment

      Remote work relies on virtual communication. Taking Simple steps like making sure your tech is working & calling from a quiet location can go a long way to building trust with project owners.

    • Bring your own plan

      One of the best ways to stand out in a project interview is to bring your own ideas about how to execute the project. You'll showcase your knowledge & bring value to project owners.

03

Work

Work on your project & meet with clients remotely.

Work from anywhere without spending money on costly housing & travel. Manage project tasks & deliverables around your schedule, and collaborate with your project team remotely.

  • Tips for a great remote work experience

    Tips for a great remote work experience
    Communication is key, especially in remote work. Here are our top tips for effective communication to ensure you have a great remote work experience:

    • Set expectations

      Agree with project owners up front when & where (on what channels) you will be available and when key deliverables should be expected.

    • Be Proactive

      Use Gradskills messaging (or other channels) to stay in regular contact with project teams, and share key information & updates proactively.

    • Ask Questions

      When in doubt, ask questions; it shows you're engaged, avoids miscommunication, and helps ensure successful outcomes.

04

Get Paid

Deliver work on time and get paid right away

Get paid for your work and keep the money you earn. Collect positive reviews from happy clients and build a portfolio to help you find more projects and/or land your dream job after university.

  • Tips for getting the most from projects

    Tips for getting the most from projects
    You've completed the project work as agreed, now what? In addition to getting paid, here are a couple things you can do to get the most from your project experience:

    • Leave a great impression

      If first impressions are most important, last impressions are close behind. Asking for feedback and making final edits to your work is a great way to leave a happy client & earn a great reference to help you in the future.

    • Build a network

      Every project grows your professional network. Let clients know you're open to more projects and/or full-time graduate roles on their team, and offer to keep in touch after the project via their preferred channels.

Getting Started on Gradskills is Quick & Simple

  • Step 1

    Sign up

    Create your free Gradskills account in minutes with your email & some basic information.

  • Step 2

    Set up Profile

    Finish setting up your profile so you can apply to projects and get found by companies directly.

  • Step 3

    Start Applying

    That's it - you're ready to work! Apply to projects you like & accept direct invitations from companies.

As simple as that.

FEES

It’s free to Join and Apply on projectsSmall fee is deducted only when you get paid.

  • Free to Join

    It's completely free to join Gradskills. There are no sign-up or membership fees.

  • Free to Apply

    Apply to as many projects as you like & get hired unlimited times, all for free.

  • 10% Service Fee

    A 10% service fee is applied when work is completed and users are paid.

Frequently Asked Questions

  • Is it safe to hire student interns remotely?

    When you hire students on GradSkills, you get the benefit of the latest innovations in remote work security trusted by millions of clients on top professional freelance platforms, including standard contracts, pay-as-you-go milestones and secure escrow payment. Work can only begin once you've authorized it, and payment is released once you approve deliverables.

  • What tools do I need to manage my projects on GradSkills?

    All you need to manage projects is your email and any additional tools that you and your team already use to collaborate. You don't need to learn any new software, and you don't need to worry about compatibility across platforms. Just work how you normally work, and let GradSkills handle the admin.

  • What is the employment status of interns I hire on GradSkills?

    All you need to manage projects is your email and any additional tools that you and your team already use to collaborate. You don't need to learn any new software, and you don't need to worry about compatibility across platforms. Just work how you normally work, and let GradSkills handle the admin.

  • Can I hire unpaid interns on GradSkills?

    All you need to manage projects is your email and any additional tools that you and your team already use to collaborate. You don't need to learn any new software, and you don't need to worry about compatibility across platforms. Just work how you normally work, and let GradSkills handle the admin.

  • Can I hire interns on an hourly basis if I need ongoing support?

    All you need to manage projects is your email and any additional tools that you and your team already use to collaborate. You don't need to learn any new software, and you don't need to worry about compatibility across platforms. Just work how you normally work, and let GradSkills handle the admin.

Posting a job is fast and easy.

Describe what you need done, set your budget and select an optional deadline. Choose to pay by task or by week / month, depending on your project needs.

Hit “Post” and wait for offers to come to you, or browse talent and invite favorites to apply directly.

Select various filters to pre-screen applicants, including location, degree level (i.e., Bachelor, Masters, PhD), degree focus, graduation year, and more.
